item.title: Postdoc Position - Tabular foundation models for epidemic modeling
item.description:
We will be hiring a postdoctoral researcher to work full-time on the DiscoReel project. The postdoc will work on foundation models for tabular data in epidemic modeling. The candidate should have a background in computer science and previous experience in designing and traning large models. No prior experience in epidemiology is needed.

The position is likely to start in early 2026 and last 1 year, renewable. More info soon. If you fit the profile and are interested in having more information please contact Eugenio Valdano.

To apply for the position please use this link. The position will be filled as soon a suitable candidate is found.

item.title: Internship - Causal analysis of PrEP and sexual behavior in MSM
item.description:
We are opening an internship position at Inserm (Paris) to work on the causal analysis of PrEP uptake and sexual behavior change among MSM, as part of the PP-IMPACT project funded by ANRS-MIE. The intern will work under the supervision of Eugenio Valdano and Charles Assaad, expert in causal inference. The analysis will use observational cohort data from Portugal and France to identify bidirectional causal links between behavior and PrEP adoption.

If you would like to have more information please contact either E. Valdano or C. Assaad.

To apply for the internship please use this link. The position will be filled as soon a suitable candidate is found.

item.title: Internship - Tabular foundation models for epidemic modeling
item.description:
We are looking for an intern to apply foundation models for tabular data to modeling spatially structured epidemics. Candidates will be 1st-year or 2nd-year master students in computer science, machine learning, physics or applied mathematics. The starting date can be from September 2025, onwards. Internships typically last 4 to 6 months. Check out our relevant publication.

If you would like to have more information please contact Eugenio Valdano.

To apply for the internship please use this link. The position will be filled as soon a suitable candidate is found.
